use nyc_taxi

--- using json Value

select 
    JSON_VALUE(jsondata,'$.payment_type') as payment_type,
    JSON_VALUE(jsondata,'$.payment_type_desc') as payment_type_Desc
from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b'
    ) with  
        (
            jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
        )as payment_type



-- using openJson method which explodes the json objects/arrays as rows

select payment_type,payment_type_desc
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with
        (
            payment_type SMALLINT,
            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(25)
        ) as payment_type_detail

-- read json objects having arrays:

select payment_type,sub_type,value
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with
        (
            payment_type SMALLINT,
            payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON
        )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
        with
        (
            sub_type SMALLINT,
            value VARCHAR(25)
        )


-- read standard json multiline

select RATE_CODE_ID,RATE_CODE
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as rate_data
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with(
                rate_code_id SMALLINT,
                rate_code VARCHAR(25)
            )

-- RATECODE JSON FORMATTED AS MULTILINE JSON

select RATE_CODE_ID,RATE_CODE
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as rate_data
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with(
                rate_code_id SMALLINT,
                rate_code VARCHAR(25)
            )
